original: 河南偃師人，郤儉之子、郤正之父。劉備入蜀後，投效劉備，被指派為孟達部屬。孟達叛蜀後，隨孟達入曹魏，官至中書令史。
text: Henan Yanshi, but thrifty son, but righteous father. After Liu Bei entered Shu, Liu Bei was appointed as a subordinate of Mengda. After Mengda rebelled against Shu, he followed Mengda into the Cao Wei, and the official to Zhongshu Lingshi.
